OOC: Ok, everybody, I need you guys to help me with something, mainly the A=
lliance members and Maximals at the battle with the Decepticons at the CF. =
 I have too many Decepticons, so I need Surgital to be destroyed, so that w=
ay all the Bodicons will be mangled and that will solve some of my characte=
r number problems.

::Surgital::

      Surgital was just about to bring hi=
s foot down hard on Cledar, when two missiles from a little punk named Grev=
en hit his chest.  Surgital was only on one leg, and the missiles easily ma=
de him fall to the ground.

       "Errr!!  Now, I crush everybody!" Surgit=
al yelled.

       He converted his hand into a big drill, then shoved it i=
nto the ground and made a huge pit, or, by the size of it, a crater.  Then,=
 he bent down to pick up Greven, and throw him in the pit.
  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  S=
ent: Tuesday, May 08, 2001 7:45 PM
  Subject: Re: Out of the Fire


  ::Gre=
ven::

  Greven growls. This bot was not going to ignore him. He wanted to
=
  fight at this battle, not just sit there.

  Charging at Surgital, Greven=
 fires two missiles at the Gestalt's
  chest.



  --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Lur=
kerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
  > ::Surgital::
  > 
  >      Surgital =
got hit in the side of his head by two charges, and
  growled out in rage. =
 Then, he felt two missiles hit his butt.
  > 
  >        "OW!" Surgital ye=
lled, jumping up a little, and rubbing his
  butt with his two hands. :)
  =
> 
  >         Then, the big one hit him.  The blast from the fusion cannon=

  was a weapon that was actually a match for him.  It hit him in the
  bac=
k, and charred his back plating, as well as left a few small
  scratches.  =
The gestalt wasn't sure how much he could take.  But
  unlike everybody els=
e, he wouldn't seperate, yet...
  > 
  >           Surgital lifted up his l=
eg, then, with all his might, sent
  it down to the ground, attempting to c=
rush Cledar.
